direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve creating a copy of the element, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods create a copy of the element, but deepClone also copies child nodes, making test cases for shallowClone applicable to deepClone with minor adjustments.
Both methods manipulate the element's child nodes, making them relevant for testing node manipulation and state changes.
Both methods interact with the element's attributes, making them relevant for testing attribute handling and state changes.
Both methods involve operations on child nodes, making them relevant for testing node addition and state changes.
Both methods interact with the element's attributes, making them relevant for testing attribute removal and state changes.
Both methods manipulate the element's text content, making them relevant for testing text manipulation and state changes.
Both methods manipulate the element's HTML content, making them relevant for testing HTML manipulation and state changes.
